director_styles.Épico / Escala Masiva (Nolan): Grand scale architectures, visceral realism, physical practical effects, vast landscapes, 1.43:1 full IMAX height.
director_styles.Atmosférico / Ciencia Ficción (Villeneuv: Atmospheric fog, silhouette lighting, brutalist architecture, monochromatic or bi-color palettes, 1.90:1 digital IMAX.
director_styles.Roger Deakins (Naturalista): Motivated naturalistic lighting, muslin bounce, mid-wide 35mm focal lengths, extreme contrast precision, sharp clean textures.
director_styles.Emmanuel Lubezki (Inmersivo): Natural light only (magic hour), ultra-wide 12-24mm, immersive long takes, zero grain, visceral proximity to subject.
director_styles.Robert Richardson (Gótico/Halo): Strong rim lighting, HALO top-down effect, blooming highlights, high color contrast, Panavision anamorphic texture.
director_styles.Greig Fraser (Táctil/LED): Chiaroscuro (shadow play), digital-native textures, LED-screen ambient light, shallow depth of field, epic scope.
director_styles.Steven Spielberg (Bypass/Haze): Janusz Kaminski style, bleach bypass ENR process, desaturated color, heavy grain, overlit blooming highlights, hazy diffuse lighting.
director_styles.Ridley Scott (Épico Desaturado): Dariusz Wolski style, huge epic scale, painterly desaturated tones, natural available light emphasis, realistic documentary-style immersion.
director_styles.Estilo Documental Rudo: Handheld 65mm feel, natural lighting, sweat and dirt detail, muted colors, high texture.

lens_presets.Panavision Ultra 70 (Anamórfico): 2x squeeze, intense oval bokeh, horizontal blue lens flares, sharp center with edge falloff.
lens_presets.IMAX Hasselblad (Esférico): Tack sharp from corner to corner, zero distortion, deep depth of field, 15/70mm resolution.
lens_presets.Cooke Anamórfico Vintage: Warm tones, subtle lens flares, painterly bokeh, organic texture.
lens_presets.Arri Alexa 65 (Digital Gran Formato): Ultra clean, massive dynamic range, modern glass characteristics.

shot_angles.Plano Gran General (EWS): Establishing the vast environment, character is small in frame, 1.43:1 ratio.
shot_angles.Plano General (WS): Full body visible, clear relationship with environment.
shot_angles.Plano Medio (MS): Waist up, focusing on interaction and wardrobe detail.
shot_angles.Primer Plano (CU): Tight on face, shallow depth of field, intense 70mm skin texture.
shot_angles.Ángulo Contrapicado (Heroico): Looking up at character, making them appear powerful.
shot_angles.Cenital / Vista de Pájaro: Looking down, showing isolation or objective perspective.
shot_angles.Ángulo Holandés (Tensión): Tilted horizon, creating tension and unease.

color_palettes.Clásico Teal & Orange: Cool shadows, warm skin tones, high dynamic range pop.
color_palettes.Desaturado / Bleach Bypass: High contrast, gritty, muted colors, metallic feel.
color_palettes.Tecnicolor Heredado: Deep reds and blues, high saturation, nostalgic 1950s epic feel.
color_palettes.Monocromo (Double-X): Hyper-detailed black and white, deep blacks, glowing silver highlights.
color_palettes.Neón Noir: Vibrant pinks and cyans against deep darkness.
